abstract: Every year, people are sharing twice as much information as the previous year, says Facebook C.E.O. Mark Zuckerberg.
snippet: Every year, people are sharing twice as much information as the previous year, says Facebook C.E.O. Mark Zuckerberg.
lead_paragraph: On stage at the Web 2.0 Summit on Thursday, Mark Zuckerberg, the chief executive of Facebook, was cheerfully unruffled.
